explains: n. （交通）拥塞，塞车；充血，淤血
wordGroup: traffic congestion 通信量拥挤；信号拥挤
congestion control 拥塞控制；拥挤控制
congestion pricing 拥挤收费；堵车费；高峰期行车收费
nasal congestion 鼻塞；鼻壅塞；鼻充血
congestion avoidance n. 拥塞避免

sentences.en: Congestion frequently reduces traffic to walking pace.
sentences.cn: 交通阻塞经常把车流的速度降低得如步行一般缓慢。

sentences.en: The problems of traffic congestion will not disappear in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 交通堵塞问题不会很快消失。

sentences.en: Traffic congestion is really bad at peak periods.
sentences.cn: 交通拥挤状况在高峰时段真是糟糕透了。
